climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Premium Material】 TABAYON velvet shag area rug is super soft and durable, soft to the touch, warm and beautiful, at the same time, it has strong toughness, not shed, not fade and no smell, creating a cozy area for kids and your family，Dense surface that is soft to the touch and piles that feeling like stepping out onto a cloud and shields toes from the cold floor.

【Life Style Design】 The shaggy soft rug adopts a minimalist design and modern style concept, use of simple color to add warmth and elegance to the room of your home, soft lightweight but not fade. The soft fluffy carpet is available in multiple colors and sizes to suit your different styles and needs, matches an ideal choice for home decoration.

【Upgraded Area Rug】 Upgraded version of the craftsmanship and design. The tight weaving process ensures that the floor carpet in this area is not easy to fall off and the edges are not easy to fall apart. non-slip latex particle backing，The anti-slip performance of carpets cannot be ignored. We have consistently researched and developed the anti-slip performance of carpets. The bottom contains dense anti-skid particles, which can hold the floor more firmly.

【Care Tips】Our shag rugs can use a hand-held vacuum to cleaning efficiently, you also can be wiped with a damp cloth, in addition, we are recommended to wash it by hand instead of machine washing, Such the round rug can have a longer service life, and after that, the rug is air-dried, it’s better if you fluff it.

【Service Guarentee】 When you open the package, it may be slightly thinner than the picture and not too flat. This is because for the convenience of transportation, our carpets are vacuum-packed, and it takes 3-5 days to recover after opening，We are sorry for any inconvenience, we will give you a satisfactory solution in time.
body.description: TABAYON Shag Area Rug Indoor Ultra Soft Plush Rugs for Living Room Nursery Faux Fur Rugs for Kids Room Home Decor Shape: Rectangular Material: Polypropylene Size: From 2x3 feet to 8x10 feet Color: Tie Dyed Grey/Tie Dyed Rainbow/White/Black/Grey Pattern: Solid Color and Tie Dyed Style Consists of 3 parts: Super soft velvet surface, Sponge interlayer, Non-slip plastic spots bottom.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TABAYON Luxury Shag Area Rug Tie Dyed Light Grey Rectangle Plush Fuzzy Rugs Some features about our shaggy floor rugs: 1. The top layer is a fluffy material and the interlayer is memory sponge. The rug for bedside is beyond soft and comfy. 2. Have a non slip surface on the rug's back. Let your children and pets can safely play on the fur carpets. 3. There are many colors and sizes of decorative accent floor carpets for you to choose from. 4. Quality is true soft nice material, make your home have a luxurious feeling. 5. Adopt sponge hemlock technology, durable lasting.

The Area Rug Detail Ultra-Soft Material The velvet shag area rug is super soft and durable, soft to the touch, warm and beautiful, and creating a cozy area for kids and your family. No Shedding The tight weaving process ensures that the floor carpet in this area is not easy to fall off and the edges are not easy to fall apart. Upgraded 3 Layer Super soft velvet surfaceSponge inter layerNon-slip plastic spots bottom

Ultra-Soft Afternoon About Tabayon Get Cozy: Our products help everyone in your family feel more comfortable in each area. Better Life: We’re always dreaming up new products to help you have a good, quality life. Everyday Value: Everything your family needs to live more comfortably. TABAYON Shag Area Rug Indoor Ultra Soft Plush Rugs for Living Room Nursery Faux Fur Rugs for Kids Room Home Decor Shape: Rectangular Material: Polypropylene Size: From 2x3 feet to 8x10 feet Color: Tie Dyed Grey/Tie Dyed Rainbow/White/Black/Grey Pattern: Solid Color and Tie Dyed Style Consists of 3 parts: Super soft velvet surface, Sponge interlayer, Non-slip plastic spots bottom.

Multiple Color and Size Available Tabayon Area Rug Packaging： In order to prevent dust better,we use vacuum packing and the rug will appear thin after opening the package,it will take 1-2 days to recover the thickness,Please give this cute rug some time to get better! At last, there are many different worries in life every day, if you happen to see them here, we hope you can be happy every day! Be happy~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everybody loves this rug
reviews.reviewText: So good looking, and soft. Has a good backing (not tacky or damaging to hard wood). Has a deep plush, like walking on a fur rug. Not so heavy I cant tend to it. I can roll this up and air it outside, or take it out and shake to flick off chip crumbs. My visitors literally take their socks off to feel this on their feet. One rubbed her cheek up and down on, said she never felt anything that soft except a baby rabbit. No alcohol was involved. You may think, its just a rug. It is a nice rug to look at, until you touch it and then you will say "I have got to get me one of these rugs".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent shag rug
reviews.reviewText: This rug is so soft and has the rubber backing to prevent it from sliding around the room. It was so soft to my feet, so I ordered a second one for another room. Worthy purchase and you will not be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great with some things to know
reviews.reviewText: First thing to know is it's a beautiful rug for the price. It's soft, beautiful and lies flat upon unboxing. It's slso very lightweight. The cons are that it has a very strong chemical smell that smells like an old basement. My entire house stinks of this odor. I'm hoping it will fade soon. Literally smells like it sat in a wet old basement. It's slippery both by sliding fairly easy and by wearing socks and kids running too fast on this can possibly slip and fall. My daughters love to make snow angels on this rug and it leaves a pattern for a little bit. Overall, I am happy with this purchase and will be happier when the smell is gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The rug is pretty but it feels like foam. I am struggling with this one. I question the durability and how long it will last? I know it wasn’t very expensive, but I don’t want to throw away money. I will keep looking. This one may be returned. Oh and it smells awful. As if wet and didn’t dry properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Amazon purchase ever!
reviews.reviewText: OMG the best thing I purchased on Amazon so far so soft so plush and it fits perfectly. It is a little bit on the thinner side so it’s very lightweight. Besides that it’s perfect I bought it to my daughter can crawl and enjoy herself on the floor and it’s just like working out so perfect. I love it if I have to buy another one I will. I bought this one on sale which was even better. I’m just so happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great rug for the price that it is. It is a little thinner than I was hoping but the softness is amazing. My son absolutely loved it when we got it. It does vacuum very well. I have not carpet cleaned it yet, but all in all I think that it is a great rug for the price that it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, beautiful luxury at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This area rug was perfect for my son’s dorm room. It is soft and looks very luxurious for the cost. I ended up buying a larger one for my home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the Color!
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you know it takes 3-5 days to fully recover from vacuum seal! Only draw back is that it is a bit sticky to your bare foot. I’ve had it a few weeks and still has the stickiness. Looks beautiful and makes my room a lot lighter. Cleaning is a bit more difficult than a regular rug but worth it. Would recommend and buy again

reviews.reviewTitle: No se dejen engañar por las malas reseñas
reviews.reviewText: Me encanto esta super suave y cumple con todo lo que necesitaba, OJO.... LA GENTE QUE SE ESTA QUEJANDO Y PONIENDO MALA CALIFICACION ES POR QUE COMPRAN LO MAS BARATO QUE ES EL tamaño MAS pequeño Y NO SE FIJAN EN LAS MEDIDAS Y ESPERAN QUE LES LLEGUE UNA ALFOMBRA ENORME POR POCO DINERO , NO SE DEJEN engañar POR ELLOS Y FIJENSE EN LAS MEDIDAS AHI ESTAN LOS PRECIOS
Después de lavarlo quedó bastante bien.

Me lleve un chasco al comprar está "ALFOMBRA" así la describen, pero no es tal, es un TAPETE, o mejor dicho un mini tapete, las fotos publicadas donde se oferta el producto parecen ser truqueadas, puesto que en las mismas se ve de un buen tamaño y ooohhh decepción 🫤😞 es demasiado chica, no luce por el mini tamaño, la puse en la sala y pasa desapercibida 😅 por el precio no lo vale 👌

Están muy bonitos en verdad vale la pena , el único inconveniente es que vienen muy apachurrados en la envoltura para hacerlos muy compactos. Eso a mí no me agrado, la emplayada está bien pero la bolsa se ve como si estuvieran derretidos. Agradezco a Amazon por su pronta entrega.
Está muy bien muy suave pero el precio- calidad difieren un poco
